titles.title: To modify a land grant patent issued by the Secretary of the Interior.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.
Mr. Sarbanes moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2121.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 7/10/2007--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Modifies a land grant patent issued by the Secretary of the Interior to the Great Lakes Shipwreck Historical Society, Chippewa County, Michigan.
